Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote")
local AttackAble = true local AttackDamaging = false local AttackWindow = 0.5 local AttackRestTime = 1 local AttackDamage = 34 local AttackType = "Slash" local AttackTypes = {"Slash", "Chop", "Spin"} local AttackConnection
function onEquipped() --ensure unequip onUnequipped()
AttackConnection = Handle.Touched:connect(onBladeTouched) end
function onUnequipped() if AttackConnection then AttackConnection:disconnect() end end
function getPlayer() return game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) end
function contains(t, v) for _, val in pairs(t) do if val == v then return true end end return false end
function tagHuman(human) local val = Instance.new("ObjectValue") val.Name = "creator" val.Value = getPlayer() val.Parent = human game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(val, 1) end
function onBladeTouched(part) if not AttackDamaging then return end
if not part:IsDescendantOf(Tool.Parent) and part.Parent and part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local human = part.Parent.Humanoid tagHuman(human) human:TakeDamage(AttackDamage) AttackDamaging = false playSound("Hit")
if human.Health <= 0 then if human.Parent:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then giftTransform(human.Parent.HumanoidRootPart) end end end end
function playSound(name, pitch, volume) local sound = Handle:FindFirstChild(name) if sound then sound.Pitch = pitch or math.random(90, 110)/100 sound.Volume = volume or 0.5 sound:Play() end end
function weld(a, b, c0) b.CFrame = a.CFrame:toWorldSpace(c0)
local w = Instance.new("Weld") w.Part0 = a w.Part1 = b w.C0 = c0 w.Parent = w.Part0 end
function r(lower, upper) return lower + math.random() * (upper - lower) end
function giftTransform(victimCamAnchor) --ensure mesh if not victimCamAnchor:FindFirstChild("Mesh") then Instance.new("SpecialMesh", victimCamAnchor).Name = "Mesh" end
--clear the character local char = victimCamAnchor.Parent for _, obj in pairs(char:GetChildren()) do if obj:IsA("BasePart") and obj ~= victimCamAnchor then obj:Destroy() end end
--morph head victimCamAnchor.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("White") victimCamAnchor.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) victimCamAnchor.Transparency = 0 victimCamAnchor.Mesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" victimCamAnchor.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.5) victimCamAnchor.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=1237207" victimCamAnchor.Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=6020478" victimCamAnchor.Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(r(0.5, 1), r(0.5, 1), r(0.5, 1))
--sound playSound("Paper", nil, 1) end
function attack() if not AttackAble then return end
--rest AttackAble = false delay(AttackRestTime, function() AttackAble = true end)
--animate Remote:FireClient(getPlayer(), "PlayAnimation", AttackType) AttackType = AttackTypes[math.random(1, 3)] playSound("Slash")
--open damage window delay(0.1, function() AttackDamaging = true delay(AttackWindow, function() AttackDamaging = false end) end) end
function onRemote(player, func, ...) if player ~= getPlayer() then return end
if func == "Attack" then attack() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Remote.OnServerEvent:connect(onRemote)

local Tool = script.Parent local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote")
local CAS = game:GetService("ContextActionService") local ActionName = "SnowmanSword"
function onAction(actionName, inputState, inputObject) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer("Attack") end end
function onEquipped() --ensure unequip onUnequipped()
--bind CAS:BindActionToInputTypes( ActionName, onAction, false, Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1, Enum.UserInputType.Touch ) end
function onUnequipped() --unbind CAS:UnbindAction(ActionName) end
function playAnimation(name, ...) local anim = Tool:FindFirstChild(name) if anim then local human = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if human then local track = human:LoadAnimation(anim) track:Play(...) end end end
function onRemote(func, ...) if func == "PlayAnimation" then playAnimation(...) end end
--connect Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Remote.OnClientEvent:connect(onRemote)
